RANJITH PERERA – Formerly of Fern Tea and Crest Fashions,​ dearly beloved husband of Charmaine,​ loving father of Thushari,​ father-in-law of Ronnie,​ darling Seeya of Thivanka and Shivangi,​ beloved brother of the late Eardley,​ Shanthi and Rohan,​ passed away on 8th April 2024. Remains will lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s from 9.00 a.m. on 10th April. Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium) on Wednesday 10th April at 5.30 p.m.
